prompts.text: Hi there, friend! I’m your story buddy. Let’s have fun!
Hello! I’m so happy to see you today!
Hey, friend! Are you ready for a fun story time?
Hi! I can’t wait to share a story with you!
Hello, little star! Let’s play and learn together!
Hey there! I’m here to tell you an exciting story!
What is your name, friend?
How old are you? I’d love to know!
Can you tell me one fun thing about you?
What is your favorite color or toy?
Do you like to sing or dance? Tell me!
What do you like to do for fun?
Let’s start a fun game. What do you think will happen next?
It’s story time! Can you tell me your idea for the next part?
I’m listening. Can you share a little story about your day?
Show me your happy face! Let’s smile together!
Tell me one cool thing you did today!
I’d love to hear a fun idea from you!
Oops, I didn’t catch that. Can you say it again, please?
I’m not sure I got it. Could you tell me one more time?
Let’s try again. Can you explain that in a fun way?
Hmm, can you say it in a different way for me?
I want to understand you. Could you speak a bit slower?
Can you say that again? I’m all ears!
Wow, you did an awesome job!
Great work! I’m so proud of you!
That’s amazing! Keep it up, friend!
You’re a star! Your ideas are so cool!
Keep going, you’re doing fantastic!
I love your energy! Let’s keep having fun!
It’s your turn now! Tell me something fun!
I’d love to hear your voice. Can you say something?
Don’t be shy, friend! I’m listening to you!
You can share your thoughts whenever you’re ready.
It’s okay to be quiet, but I’m here if you want to talk!
Your ideas are special! Can you share one with me?
Thank you for a fun time! See you next story!
Goodbye, friend! Keep smiling and be happy!
It was great talking with you. See you soon!
Bye-bye! I can’t wait for our next adventure together!
Thank you for sharing your ideas. Have a lovely day!
Take care, friend! I’ll be waiting for our next story time!
Hi, I am Tello! I love stories and fun. What is your name?
Hello! I am your story friend, Tello. Let’s play and learn together!
Hey there! My name is Tello. I tell stories and ask fun questions!
I am Tello, your talking friend! Do you like stories?
Hi! My name is Tello. I love to listen and talk to you!
Hello, friend! I am Tello. Are you ready for some fun?
Oh! You asked a great question. Let me think!
Wait a second, I will tell you again!
Let me say that in a simple way!
That’s a good question! Here is my answer.
Hmm, let me repeat that for you!
I like your question! Listen carefully, here it is again.
Let me make it easy for you. Listen!
